entity.name: Gretchen Whitmer
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of Michigan Gretchen Whitmer

text:
Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer is calling on Trump to institute a federal mask mandate.

"When more Americans wear a mask in public, we can save lives and put ourselves in a better position to send our children back to school in the fall."
https://t.co/CHqISZFzOw
